manager script¶

Manager Functions¶

exception manager.AlreadyProcessed(message=None)¶

Used to indicate that the group has already been processed.

class manager.Reason¶

Used in node_summary as proxy to display reasons why node was not split.

manager.burn()¶

Removes and destroys all files in Item records, then removes database.

Warning

Will remove all files and reset the database.

manager.check_database()¶

Check if database contains File model.

Returns:True on exists, else False
manager.create_table()¶
manager.drop_tables()¶
manager.get_indent(node, level=0)¶

Helper for node_summary to create indent level.

Parameters:
  • node (File) – Peewee record from File model
  • level (int) – current level
Returns:

returns level or recursively runs until no parents are available
Return type:

[int | get_indent()]
manager.menu(leaves_only=False)¶

Creates listing of records in database.

Parameters:leaves_only (bool) – show leaves only, default is False
manager.node_summary(node, f, Q_THRESHOLD, SHAPE_THRESHOLD, GT_THAN_ZERO)¶

Creates summary for a particular node, both describing the node itself as well as listing reasons why it was not split.

Parameters:
  • node (File) – Peewee record from File database
  • f (file) – summary text file to append to
  • Q_THRESHOLD (float) –
  • SHAPE_THRESHOLD (int) –
  • GT_THAN_ZERO (bool) –
manager.partition(idx, shape_threshold=5, q_threshold=0.0, gt_than_zero=True, optimize=False)¶

Partitions the specified group given the appropriate shape and Q threshold, along with whether or not to check if the threshold is greater than or greater than or equal to the set Q threshold.

Parameters:
  • idx (int) – ID of group to partition
  • shape_threshold (int) – shape threshold, default is 5
  • q_threshold (float) – Q threshold, default is 0.0
  • gt_than_zero (bool) – greater than Q or greater than or equal to Q, default is True
  • optimize (bool) – whether or not to optimize groupings, default is False
Raises:

AlreadyProcessed, CannotSplit, DoesNotExist
manager.partition_all(shape_threshold=5, q_threshold=0.0, gt_than_zero=True, optimize=False)¶

Recursively partition groupings until no more groupings to be partitioned exist.

Parameters:
  • shape_threshold (int) – shape threshold, default is 5
  • q_threshold (float) – Q threshold, default is 0.0
  • gt_than_zero (bool) – greater than Q or greater than or equal to Q, default is True
  • optimize (bool) – whether or not to optimize groupings, default is False
Returns:

returns None on finish
Return type:

NoneType
manager.reset_database()¶
manager.save_all(directory='results', leaves_only=True, summary=False)¶

Save the results of groupings to a series of text files.

Note

Directory will be created if it does not exist.

Parameters:
  • directory (str) – default is to save to ‘results’
  • leaves_only – save only the leaves of the binary tree, default is True
  • leaves_only – bool
  • summary (bool) – save a summary of the split information, default is False
manager.tree_summary(filename, Q_THRESHOLD, SHAPE_THRESHOLD, GT_THAN_ZERO)¶

Create a summary of split information, including hypothetical splits and reasoning why the splits were denied.

Parameters:
  • filename (str) –
  • Q_THRESHOLD (float) –
  • SHAPE_THRESHOLD (int) –
  • GT_THAN_ZERO (bool) –
manager.view(idx)¶

View a particular groupings information.

Note

If specified node has a parent a prompt will be presented asking if you would like to view that node’s parent.

Parameters:idx (int) – ID of File record to view
Raises:DoesNotExist, AttributeError

Uses loadtxt to textfile filled with bitstrings to workable format.

Parameters:
  • filename – filename to convert
  • blank – whether or not to remove ‘blank’ objects, write ‘blank’ to use, default is False

do_reset_database(line)¶
do_save_all(line)¶

Saves all files using save_all(). Will not attempt if database is empty.

Parameters:
  • directory – directory to save results to, default is ‘results’
  • summarize – flag to save tree summary along with results, write ‘summarize’ to use, default is False
